text:
To make a htpasswd file for Linux apache on WindowsXP, I used htpasswd.exe. But 
option -d looks not work. Instead of that, used default -m...md5 encliption.
creator: m.yamamura@at21.jp

text: doesn't work in Windows 2K, evene when using Apache 2.0.
creator: gwilsonmail@canada.com

text:
It doesn't work on windows at all, because windows doesn't provide a crypt
function. We should remove that option from the help screen under win32.
creator: nd@perlig.de
